title: Iran Sup. Leader appts. half Guardian Council

content.question: Which of the following is true of Iranâ€™s Supreme Leader?

choices.label: He reviews all laws to make sure they are constitutional.
He has the power to appoint half of the members of the Guardian Council.
He can be dismissed by the President for failing to act according to Islamic principles.
His power is constrained by an active legislature with substantial investigative authority.
Although he can serve for an unlimited number of years, he must face the voters every four years for reelection.

content.answer: He has the power to appoint half of the members of the Guardian Council.
